DOC.criteria: Healthy female ( nonchildbearing potential ) male subject 18 60 year age ( inclusive ) Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Screening Visit Day 1 , weigh 50 kg Screening .
